transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Hi, I need to request a refill on my metoprolol.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thanks for calling Pivot Point Orthopedics. Part of Pretty Good AI. Am I speaking with Alex?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: No, this is Jennifer Liu. I'm calling to request a refill on my metoprolol 50mg. My pharmacy is Rite Aid.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Got it, Jennifer. Can you please provide your date of birth?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Let me confirm your details. I have your name as Jennifer Liu and your date of birth as February fourteenth nineteen eighty six. Is that correct? If so, could you please spell your first and last name for me?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yes, that's correct. My first name is spelled J-E-N-N-I-F-E-R and my last name is L-I-U.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Would you like me to look up your record using the phone number you have on file with us? If so, please provide that number. If you're not sure, just let me know.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yes, please use the phone number on file. It's 555-0123.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: And we can confirm your name and date of birth again.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yes, my name is Jennifer Liu and my date of birth is February 14, 1986. While I have you, can I also schedule a follow-up appointment in about two weeks?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Let me confirm your phone number on file as five five five zero

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yes, that's correct. And about the follow-up appointment, could you help me schedule that for about two weeks from now?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: one two three. Your name is Jennifer Liu, and your date of birth is February fourteenth nineteen eighty six. Is all of that correct?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yes, that's all correct. Can we go ahead with scheduling the appointment?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I'm having trouble pulling up your record in the system, so I can't process your refill or

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Oh, one more thing—before we address that, is it possible to get a referral to a cardiologist as well?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: schedule your appointment right now. I'll make sure our clinic support team follows up with you as soon as possible.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: I understand. Please have them follow up on the refill, appointment, and the cardiologist referral. Thank you for your help. Goodbye.
